'''Beta 1.14.30.51''' is the first and only beta version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.14.30]], released on January 29, 2020,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360039327231|title=Minecraft Beta - 1.14.30.51 (Xbox One/Windows 10/Android)|date=January 29, 2020}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Fixes ==
'''Crashes'''
* Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay.
* 256x resolution packs are now restricted on Xbox One to prevent crashing.
* Fixed a crash that could occur in certain worlds. ({{bug|MCPE-59756}})

'''General'''
* Split screen now displays a message to join when the main controller is disconnected.

'''Gameplay'''
* Auto-jump no longer triggers unexpectedly when trying to walk through open doors. ({{bug|MCPE-52213}})
* Crafting multiple honey blocks now returns the correct amount of empty glass bottles on a 2x2 grid. ({{bug|MCPE-58579}})</onlyinclude>
